data.title: Why the USA lost the war in Vietnam
data.meta_description: For Higher History, study the reasons the USA lost the war in Vietnam.  Learn the tactics used by both sides and the growing opposition to war in the USA.
data.text:
Higher

Why the USA lost the war in VietnamNorth Vietnam

In the 1950s, Vietnam descended into civil war, with the Southern government and US forces attempting to stop the spread of communism. However, by the early 1970s the USA was forced to withdraw.

Part of
